body_html:
Thanks. That sounds plausible. Is there a way to check if there are a lot of denormal floats?

Is default compilation settings/hardware support for denormal floats in GPU? I don't get as much slow down in GPU. I have Titan X on one machine and GTX 1080 on another.

body:
Thanks. That sounds plausible. Is there a way to check if there are a lot of denormal floats? 

Is default compilation settings/hardware support for denormal floats in GPU? I don't get as much slow down in GPU. I have Titan X on one machine and GTX 1080 on another.
